aboutGame:
About game
RNG Incremental 1.0 Final Release
Developed by Humfrey
Inspired by Luck Idle level by 000000000000011 in Geometry Dash.
startHelpDescription: Choose the page to read it
startChangelogDescription: Choose the version to read it
help1:
Welcome to Luck Incremental!

It's luck based game where you roll once per 2 seconds and receive various rarities from Nothing to ... rn only Average.
Yes! This game will have hundreds of rarities soon :D.

Press the "Roll" button to roll some rarity, you'll get "Nothing" with 1/2 (50%) chance, "Absolute worst" with 1/4 (25%) and so on.
More info in "Roll system".

P.S. this game is raw now and won't have super ultra UI. It would be simple as Omega Layers for example. Of course I'll add some stuff later.
help2:
Roll System in details

This game has difficult roll system but I'll explain:
There is Random Number Generator which creates number in range of 1 to max (1024), but can be extended.
Chance system works with ranges. For example for Nothing you need to get number in range from 512 to 1024 (not max/2, but max-max/2, there would be difference as you get Roll Buster!)
Roll Buster reduces range of first 3 rarities to expand more for rest. After upgrade Nothing will have 1024-1024/2.1 (1024-487=537). So you'll get Nothing if you get Random Number in range of 537-1024. Which is smaller than 512-1024.
That would make ~300-1024 range for first three rarities while 0-300 for much better. For example there will be 1/14 chance for Disgusting instead of 1/16. And rest chances will be increased too!

So if you have 1 roll you can get rarity with their chance in brackets like Nothing(1/2) - means "once per 2 rolls" (NOT GUARANTEED) or 50%.
If you have 100 rolls you can get approx. 50 Nothings, 25 Absolute worst and so on. It's only approximately.
It means you can even get 10 Awful within 10 rolls if their chance 1/1024.

BUT! You can't get more rarities if their chance (1/x) where x larger than your max limit (1024). It means you won't get Terrible even after million rolls, because rng can't reach 1/2048 with 1024 limit.
help3:
Rarities - game currency

Right! Rarities are actually currencies and you can buy upgrades and unlockables with them.
You can get them with rolling and each rarity has own chance.
Basically it's twice as lower than previous rarity chance.
Soon in 1.1 you will be able to craft them into higher version as in 1.2 you will be able to downgrade them.
help4:
Upgrades to make progress faster

You can buy various upgrades like autoclicker, roll cooldown and so on with rarities
Each upgrade has V as max level but can be Mastered in later game (1.2).
All levels of upgrades has different price so they will require not just more rarities, but could require higher rarities too.
help5:
Crafter

Crafter is new tool which can be unlocked after buying Trophy II. It makes higher rarity from lower ones. Requires 3 lower rarities to get 1 higher. There is also opportunities to craft 10, 100, 1000 and 10000 in further game.
help6:
Decrafter

Decrafter is another tool which can be unlocked after buying Trophy III. It disassembles rarity into lower ones and requires 1 high rarity to make 2 lower. You also can decraft 10, 100, 1000 and 10000 in further game.
help7:
Mastery

Congratulations! You have unlocked Mastery! Get new Mastery Dice which has long cooldown, but you will receive brand new Mastery Rarities, and first one is Newbie.

With Mastery Rarities you can buy Mastery Upgrades and they can improve your upgrades even more! Pro tip: if you want to reduce cooldown of Mastery Dice, then I recommend you buy Mastered Trophy, it will unlock new 3 upgrades especially for Mastery Dice.
help8:
Frequently asked questions (FAQ)

Q: There is missing a lot things!
A: I know, it's raw version without QoL stuff. I'll add in future updates: offline progress, disable of autosave, mobile adaption, language, news ticker, improvement of UI, loading screen, prestige layer and so on.

Q: What's endgame?
A: There is no endgame, well you can have 3 goals: Buy Trophy I ➔ Get all upgrades maxed (and buy Trophy I) ➔ Get 1 Average. Well for next thing you need to buy Trophy.

Q: Game is so unbalanced.
A: Let me know in my discord server how I can improve it. Y'all testers so I'd appreciate any feedback! Also it might be your bad luck XD.

Q: Game looks so poor
A: Duh what you expect from raw 1.0? I'll add much more stuff in 1.1! I just want y'all to play this game early!
help9:
Prestige

If you see this you are close to Prestige!

For first you need to fill 5 various requirements: Trophy V, rolls, mastery rolls, newbie and Worthy rarity.

After Prestige you reset everything except total stuff and of course Prestige content (in future resets).

You also gain Prestige Dice and unlock new Prestige Roll which gives you Prestige Rarities (for now only Unknown) and has very long cooldown.

You can spend Prestige Rarities on brand new 16 (yet 13) Prestige Upgrades to make progress between prestiges faster!
changelog1:
07.11.2024 | RNG Incremental Alpha 1:
- GAME ALPHA RELEASE! There is gameplay for few hours to get endgame goal - Trophy I.
- 20 RARITIES!
- 6 NEW UPGRADES WITH 5 LEVELS MAX EACH EXCEPT TROPHY!
[Dev comment: this is very alpha version just to show you how chance mechanic works, in future versions I'm gonna add all missing QoL stuff. I made this within 4 days but it's only few hours of gameplay. For beta release (0.1-0.3) I want to add a lot details like info about game, discord server button, offline prod and so on. For final release (1.0) I'm gonna add at least few days of gameplay. Maybe I'll change my mind, unlike Digital God I barely have noted ideas for Luck Incremental. But I hope I receive positive feedback for this game so it would make motivate me more. Now I'm gonna finish Digital God 0.13 I swear.]
changelog2:
23.01.2025 | RNG Incremental Beta 1.4:
- Added changelog as in-game window.
- Added "Speed up" and "Skip" buttons for offline ticks window.
- Cloud saves improvement which let you load local save if you can't connect to API.
- Balanced Speed Up, reduced base effect percent from 25% to 15% and reduced starting Roll Cooldown from 2s to 1.5s.
- Balanced Autoclicker, reduced base effect percent from 25% to 20% and reduced starting cooldown from 4s to 3s.


21.01.2025 | RNG Incremental Beta 1.3:
- CLOUD SAVES! You can save your game into cloud to sync your game across devices. The only thing you need is secret key to prevent stealing (EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE, MAY NOT WORK PROPERLY).
- Nerfed Play Dice to max effect x15.


17.01.2025 | RNG Incremental Beta 1.2:
- Added offline production which 5 times slower than autoroll. You can control max ticks in settings.
- Added mobile adaptation.
- Game layout improvements.
- Upgrades prices increased.
- Nerfed Play Dice to max effect x50.
- Nerfed Autoclicker from 2s to 4s.
- Blacksmith base effect reduced from 7% to 6%.
- Added info about current -> next effects in 7-9 upgrades.


16.01.2025 | RNG Incremental Beta 1.1:
- Added "About game" tab.
- Removed "Enter" block button, so you can hold button to roll.
- Fixed bug with 5+ levels of upgrades being available before Trophy I.
- Improved Play Dice effect scaling.


15.01.2025 | RNG Incremental Beta 1:
- GAME BETA RELEASE!
- GAMEPLAY CONTINUED! Current endgame is Trophy IV
- 12 NEW RARITIES!
- 3 NEW UPGRADES!
- +3 NEW LEVELS FOR ALL UPGRADES! Except Trophy.
- CRAFTER! Assemble lower rarities to get higher one!
- DECRAFTER! Dissemble higher rarity to get lower ones!
- NEWS TICKER! Join discord server to suggest more funny tickers!
- Improvement in roll button.
- Added autosave disable and timer.
- Added notification when you save, load, export.
- Added "Rarities" tab in Information.
- Added new How To Play tabs.
changelog3:
29.01.2025 | RNG Incremental Beta 2.0:
- MASTERY! UNLOCK NEW DICE, RARITY AND UPGRADES TO IMPROVE YOUR PROGRESS EVEN MORE.
- NEW DICE.
- NEW MASTERY RARITY.
- 9 NEW MASTERY UPGRADES!
- +3 NEW UPGRADES.
- +8 RARITIES.
- NEW UPGRADE LEVELS LIMIT - 10!
- Crafter and Decrafter UI remake.
- Small UI improvements.
- Mobile adaptation improvements.
- Decrafter use 2 high rarities to make 3 lower instead of 1 to 2.
- Decrafter lowest rarity is Standard.
- Small fixes for upgrades text.
changelog4:
04.02.2025 | RNG Incremental 1.0 Final Release:
- PRESTIGE SYSTEM! Reset all progress and gain Prestige Dice to roll Prestige Rarities!
- NEW DICE - Prestige Dice.
- NEW PRESTIGE RARITY!
- 16 NEW PRESTIGE UPGRADES!
- +10 NEW RARITIES.
- Increased prices of upgrades.
- Added Discord button in About Game.
- Added Max RNG text.
- Fixed Win The Dice didn't add rolls.
- Small UI improvements.
